All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionPhase
Action phase class administrator
Bag
Bag class used to generate students
ChosenIsland
Choose and Island and resolve the island as if Mother Nature had ended her movement there.
Cli
Main Class of the Client Connection
Client
Main Class of the Client Connection
ClientEventManager
Event Manager for the Client
CLIutils
Class containing all the utilities needed to create a visual CLI
CloudTile
CloudTile class, to manage the clouds
ConnectionHandler
Connection Handler for managing Client
ConnectionScene
 
ControlEventManager
Control class to manage events
Controller
Main Class of the Controller, one for each game
Deck
Deck class for AssistantCard, one for each player
EndPhase
End phase class administrator
EventManager
Interface for Event Management
EventReceiver
Observer Pattern Subscriber Interface
FromCardToEntrance
You may take up to 3 students from this card and replace them with the same number of Students from your Entrance
FromEntranceToDiningRoom
You may exchange up to 2 Students between your Entrance and your Dining Room
Game
Main Class of the model, all the interaction from the controller is made with method here
GameCreationScene
 
Gui
 
Island
Class Island, to manage the islands
LoginScene
 
MainScene
 
ModelEventManager
Event Manager for all the model classes
MotherNature
Mother Nature Class for better implementation of the movement phase
MoveAgainMotherNature
You may move Mother Nature up to 2 additional Islands than is indicated by the Assistant card you've played
MoveNotAllowed
 
NoColorCount
Choose a color of Student: during the influence calculation this turn, that color adds no influence
NoCountTower
When resolving a Conquering on an Island, towers do not count towards influence
NoEntryTilesEffect
Place a No Entry tile on an Island of your choice.
NumPlayerScene1
 
Pair
Class that associate thread of serverClient with client nickname
PlanningPhase
Planning phase class administrator
PlanningPhaseScene
 
Player
Player Class, one for each player
PlayerNotExist
 
PlusTwoEffect
During the influence calculation this turn, your count has having 2 more points
ProfessorControl
During this turn, you take control of any number of Professors even if you have the same number of Students as the player who currently controls them
ReplaceStudentsInBag
Choose a color of Student: every player (including yourself) must return 3 Students of that color from his Dining Room to the bag.
SchoolBoard
SchoolBoard Class for every Player
Server
Main Class of the server, all the interaction from the controller is made with method here
ServerEventManager
Event Manager for the Server
SpecialCard
Abstract Class for the Character Card
StartScene
 
StudentToDiningRoom
Take 1 Student from this card and place it in your Dining Room.
StudentToIsland
Take 1 Student from this card and place it on an Island of your choice.
ToMuchPlayerException
 
TowerColor
Enumeration Class for TowerColor
VirtualModel
